api_endpoint.description: The URL to use for the DigitalOcean API.

spaces_access_id.description: The access key ID for Spaces API operations.

spaces_secret_key.description: The secret access key for Spaces API operations.

token.description: The token key for API operations.

certificate_id.description: ID of a DigitalOcean managed TLS certificate for use with custom domains

created_at.description: The date and time (ISO8601) of when the CDN endpoint was created.

custom_domain.description: fully qualified domain name (FQDN) for custom subdomain, (requires certificate_id)

endpoint.description: fully qualified domain name (FQDN) to serve the CDN content

origin.description: fully qualified domain name (FQDN) for the origin server

ttl.description: The amount of time the content is cached in the CDN

urn.description: the uniform resource name for the floating ip
the uniform resource name for the load balancer

created_at.description: the date and time when the project was created, (ISO8601)

environment.description: the environment of the project's resources

name.description: the human-readable name for the project

owner_id.description: the id of the project owner.

owner_uuid.description: the unique universal identifier of the project owner.

resources.description: the resources associated with the project

updated_at.description: the date and time when the project was last updated, (ISO8601)

acl.description: Canned ACL applied on bucket creation

force_destroy.description: Unless true, the bucket will only be destroyed if empty

urn.description: the uniform resource name for the bucket

allowed_headers.description: A list of headers that will be included in the CORS preflight request's Access-Control-Request-Headers. A header may contain one wildcard (e.g. x-amz-*).

allowed_methods.description: A list of HTTP methods (e.g. GET) which are allowed from the specified origin.

allowed_origins.description: A list of hosts from which requests using the specified methods are allowed. A host may contain one wildcard (e.g. http://*.example.com).

urn.description: the uniform resource name for the volume.

droplet_limit.description: The total number of Droplets current user or team may have active at one time.

email.description: The email address used by the current user to register for DigitalOcean.

email_verified.description: If true, the user has verified their account via email. False otherwise.

floating_ip_limit.description: The total number of Floating IPs the current user or team may have.

status.description: This value is one of "active", "warning" or "locked".

status_message.description: A human-readable message giving more details about the status of the account.

uuid.description: The unique universal identifier for the current user.

domains.description: domains for which the certificate was issued

not_after.description: expiration date and time of the certificate

urn.description: the uniform resource name for the domain

backups.description: whether the droplet has backups enabled

created_at.description: the creation date for the Droplet

disk.description: the size of the droplets disk in gigabytes

image.description: the image id or slug of the Droplet

ipv6.description: whether the droplet has ipv6 enabled

locked.description: whether the droplet has been locked

memory.description: memory of the droplet in megabytes

monitoring.description: whether the droplet has monitoring enabled

private_networking.description: whether the droplet has private networking enabled

region.description: the region that the droplet instance is deployed in

size.description: the current size of the Droplet

urn.description: the uniform resource name for the Droplet

volume_ids.description: list of volumes attached to the droplet

droplet_id.description: the droplet id that the floating ip has been assigned to.

region.description: the region that the floating ip is reserved to

urn.description: the uniform resource name for the floating ip

distribution.description: distribution of the OS of the image

image.description: slug or id of the image

min_disk_size.description: minimum disk size required by the image

private.description: Is the image private or non-private

regions.description: list of the regions that the image is available in

algorithm.description: algorithm used to determine which backend Droplet will be selected by a client

droplet_ids.description: ids of the droplets assigned to the load balancer

droplet_tag.description: the name of a tag corresponding to droplets assigned to the load balancer

enable_proxy_protocol.description: whether PROXY Protocol should be used to pass information from connecting client requests to the backend service

forwarding_rule.description: list of forwarding rules of the load balancer

healthcheck.description: health check settings for the load balancer

ip.description: public-facing IP address of the load balancer

redirect_http_to_https.description: whether http requests will be redirected to https

region.description: the region that the load blanacer is deployed in

status.description: current state of the Load Balancer

sticky_sessions.description: sticky sessions settings for the load balancer

urn.description: the uniform resource name for the load balancer

sizes.description: List of filtered digital ocean sizes.

public_key.description: public key part of the ssh key

droplet_ids.description: list of droplet ids the volume is attached to

filesystem_label.description: the label currently applied to the filesystem

filesystem_type.description: the type of filesystem currently in-use on the volume

region.description: the region that the volume is provisioned in

size.description: the size of the volume in gigabytes

urn.description: the iniform resource name for the volume
